channel.title: translate on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in translate on Just a Memo

item.title: Linux 命令行字典
item.description: 网络字典（推荐方案） Install $ sudo emerge -avq app-i18n/translate-shell Config filename: .translate-shell/init.trans 1 2 3 4 5 { :tl ["zh-CN"] :user-agent "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/63.0" :proxy "http://192.168.0.199:8087" } USE $ trans en:zh good $ trans good $ trans zh:en 好 $ trans 好 :en $ trans holster :ja // to japanese $ trans -x http://192.168.0.199:8087 good // by a proxy
